interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free
Review Date: 2022/05/01
Store: Kopari
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'}
Review Text: This is the perfect lip gloss. It smells amazing but best of all, it doesn’t feel sticky! It feels hydrating but doesn’t give that sticky feeling that most lipglosses have. I love that the brand is vegan. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy it again.
Review Title: Smells like bubblegum and non sticky!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Caudalie Favorites Set {'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'} I am a big fan of caudalie products. This is a mini size kit and is perfect for travel. There are five products in this kit. I have sensitive skin and I always trust caudalie! Plus, the products always have a pleasant smell. Favorite No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'} I really like this face wash. I've used it just in my hands to wash my face really quickly, and I've also used it with my facial cleansing brush to get a deeper clean. It smells amazing. It has a thicker consistency and lathers, which I really like because it makes my face feel extra clean. Would buy this again! Would repurchase! LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} This has a great smell but I found the product was too thin for my damaged hair. I prefer a thicker hair cream spray. If you’re looking for a very light spray, you may enjoy this product. Not thick enough Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'} I’ve used this brand for years so I was excited to find this value pack! The packaging is beautiful and could make a nice Christmas gift. This is a great starter set to introduce someone to the brand. It comes with the cleanser, cream and serum. All the products are high quality and have been on my go to list for years. This is an excellent value. Value pack Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} This is a really fun set and would make a good gift. It comes with 7 masks and lists what order to use them in. Varies from hydrating, brightening to clarifying masks.

These are all cloth masks and easy to use. After the week my skin did feel very well hydrated. This is a bit expensive for what it is, but is a fun splurge. 7 masks SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz SIMPLIGROWN ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} I bought this because I needed something talc and fragrance free. I pay careful attention to what I use on my body and a lot of baby powders have a lot of not so good ingredients. This is a cleaner brand and I would use it again! Cleaner ingredients REALHER Cheek Trio - Ultimate Glow Getter - Blush, Highlighter, & Bronzer Contour Palette - High Quality, Silky Formulation RealHer {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.56 x 0.67 inches; 3.25 Ounces'} This is a very pretty contour kit. It has a blush color, hi lighter and a darker contour color. I like that the packaging isn’t huge which makes it good for travel. The colors are very pretty and they last on my face all day. I would buy this again. Pretty contour STARAMZ 7 Set Bachelorette Scrunchies Bridesmaid Proposal Gifts Hair Ties for Women Bachelorette Party Favors ( Blush) STARAMZ {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'STARAMZ', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '7', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.8 x 2.44 inches; 2.89 Ounces'} These are very cute scrunchies for a bridesmaid gift. The pack comes with 6 pink and 1 white. It’s a shiny material and looks pretty. These would be great in a proposal box or for the wedding. Great gift KoluaWax Wax Strips for Hair Removal on Arms, Legs, Underarm, Eyebrow, Bikini Line, and Brazilian - Contains 40 Ready To Use Waxing Strips KoluaWax {'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'KoluaWax', 'Number of Items': '40', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count'} These are pretty solid wax strips. I probably wouldn’t use them on the bikini area but they’re fine for legs.

Has a bit of an unpleasant smell. Easy to use. I heat them up with a blow dryer for a few seconds then stick on my legs and pull. Also comes with an oil cloth to remove any leftover wax. Easy to use NIRA Skincare Laser & Serum Bundle - Includes Anti-Aging Laser & Hyaluronic Acid Serum - Reduces Appearance of Fine Lines & Wrinkles - FDA Cleared Nira {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Nira'} I have been using this device for a full three months. I can honestly say that I don’t think it’s made a whole lot of difference in my under eye area.

The device is easy to use and has different levels. It holds a charge very well. Occasionally I would get a little “zap” but it wasn’t anything super painful.

This device is pretty expensive. Weighing the cost versus the results, I personally wouldn’t buy this again. Expensive Silk Exfoliating Mitt,Deep Exfoliating Mitt Body Scrub And Face Scrub,Dead Skin Removal Smooth Skin And Keratosis Pilaris Treatment VOFEL {'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliator,Smooth Skin,Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 4.61 x 0.43 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456406847'} Honestly, this is just ok. It doesn’t do a whole lot since it isn’t rough. I was looking for something that would better exfoliate. Definitely overpriced. I wouldn’t buy it again. Overpriced Prairie Rose Organics Cocoa Butter Cream Peppermint Body Butter - Mint Cocoa Whipped Body Cream Prairie Rose Organics {'Brand': 'Prairie Rose Organics', 'Scent': 'Mint,Peppermint', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.21 x 4.21 x 3.15 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '617270048740'} I have been using this all week and it’s the perfect holiday lotion. It smells so yummy. It keeps me moisturized and skin feeling soft. I appreciate the clean ingredients as well. The price is fair for this product. If you need a new lotion I would check this out! Smells great Natural Makeup Removing Wipes (42 Count) by Ducalm Skincare - Infused with Lavender, Sunflower and Jojoba - Gentle Towelette to Remove Resistant Makeup and Dirt - Alcohol and Paraben Free, 3pk Ducalm Skincare {'Brand': 'Ducalm Skincare', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '42.00 Count', 'Product Benefits': 'Gentle,Dirt,Makeup', 'Item Form': 'Wipes', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 3.7 x 3.31 inches; 11.96 Ounces'} This came in 3 boxes of 14 wipes. They are each individually wrapped. They have a light scent and work well to remove makeup. I appreciate this product being vegan and biodegradable. I would definitely buy this again. Value pack Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free Kopari {'Brand': 'Kopari', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Smoothening,Soothing,Shine,Nourishing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.69 x 3.19 x 1.34 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '850036833345'} This is the perfect lip gloss. It smells amazing but best of all, it doesn’t feel sticky! It feels hydrating but doesn’t give that sticky feeling that most lipglosses have. I love that the brand is vegan. I am very happy with this purchase and would buy it again. Smells like bubblegum and non sticky!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Preference**: The user continues to favor Caudalie and Higher Education Skincare, but has recently engaged with Kopari, indicating an openness to brands that offer innovative and effective solutions.

- **Skin Sensitivity**: The user maintains a focus on products suitable for sensitive skin, emphasizing gentle and unscented formulations, although recent experiences suggest a willingness to explore products with pleasant scents if they align with quality and efficacy.

- **Product Formulation**: The user's preferences for liquid cleansing formulations and thicker textures in hair care are still evident, but recent appreciation for hydrating gel products indicates a broader acceptance of diverse textures, particularly in lip care.

- **Convenience**: Travel-friendly sizes and aesthetically pleasing packaging remain important, along with a critical eye towards value and effectiveness in beauty tools, suggesting elevated expectations for quality.

- **Fragrance**: While still primarily attracted to unscented products, the user has shown enjoyment of certain scents, particularly when accompanied by high performance.

- **Quality Standards**: A discerning approach continues, highlighted by recent positive reviews for effective and cleanly formulated products. The user seeks high-quality, versatile items that balance performance and value, increasingly appreciating hydrating qualities in cosmetics.

Overall, the user exemplifies a health-conscious mindset in beauty and skincare, prioritizing comfort for sensitive skin while gradually embracing enjoyable scents and diverse formulations.
